short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor captions for specific words in Google Meet and take actions based on them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MeetAlert - Keyword Monitoring for Google Meet with Telegram Notifications

MeetAlert helps you track important keywords during your Google Meet meetings by monitoring the live captions. Get instant notifications via Telegram whenever your name or any chosen keyword is mentioned, and automatically generate a summary of the meeting based on the captions.

Key features:

Real-time keyword tracking in Google Meet captions.
Instant Telegram alerts when your selected keywords or name are mentioned.
Automated meeting summaries highlighting key points from the discussion.
Stay informed even when multitasking or unable to actively participate.
MeetAlert ensures you stay updated on important mentions and topics in your meetings, helping you manage your time effectively without missing critical information.
